titles.industries: We work with companies like yours

qrCode.title: QR Code Menu
qrCode.description: Share your menu instantly with a simple QR scan. Customers can browse without downloading any app.

tablet.title: Tablet Ready
tablet.description: Designed to work seamlessly on tablets. Give your staff an easy, modern tool to manage orders.

giftCard.title: Gift & Stamp Cards
giftCard.description: Reward loyal customers with digital gift and stamp cards. Easy to use and eco-friendly.

marketing.title: Marketing Tools
marketing.description: Promote your business with built-in campaigns and offers. Reach more customers effortlessly.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Offer menus in multiple languages. Make every guest feel at home with inclusive communication.

comission.title: 0% Commission
comission.description: Keep 100% of your earnings. No hidden fees, no commission on your sales.

data.title: Data ownership
data.description: Your customer data stays yours. Gain insights and build relationships without relying on third parties.

abTesting.title: A / B testing
abTesting.description: Test different menu designs, prices, or promotions. See what works best with real customer behavior.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Tailor your menu to your brand. Add logos, colors, and styles that reflect your restaurant’s identity.

tableTurnover.title: Table turnover
tableTurnover.description: Speed up service and reduce wait times. Digital menus help free tables faster and boost revenue.

gastroMarket.title: Gastro Market
gastroMarket.description: Make menus of all restaurants for your market to be in one QR code.

hotels.title: Hotels
hotels.description: Make your menu ready in the language of your guests as soon as they scan the QR code.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Leverage your status providing a digital professional service.

chains.title: Chains
chains.description: Never before was so easy to create and maintain menus across different locations.

bullets.01: Flawless Viewing, Anywhere: Our adaptive display guarantees a fast, beautiful menu on any device and any connection.
bullets.02: Instant Access: Customers scan the QR code and the menu opens instantly in their browser. No app download required.
bullets.03: Engage & Interact: Let diners 'like' their favorite dishes, providing you with valuable feedback while making them feel connected.
bullets.04: Always Accurate: Show real-time availability and pricing, eliminating customer frustration and confusion.

bullets.01: An intuitive CMS that feels like using your favorite social media app. No technical skills needed.
bullets.02: Create, edit, and organize categories and menu items with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
bullets.03: Schedule menus to appear at specific times of day (e.g., breakfast, lunch, dinner).
bullets.04: Visually highlight promotions, new items, or chef's recommendations to drive sales.

bullets.01: Match the menu to your brand with custom colors, fonts, and your restaurant's logo.
bullets.02: Choose from multiple layouts to best present your food and drinks.
bullets.03: Add allergen information, dietary tags (vegan, gluten-free), and calorie counts easily.
bullets.04: Create a consistent brand experience from the moment your customer sits down.

bullets.01: Offer digital loyalty cards to encourage repeat business. 'Buy 5 coffees, get the 6th free!'
bullets.02: Sell digital gift cards directly through your menu—a perfect revenue booster.
bullets.03: Allow customers to create profiles to save their favorite items and track loyalty rewards.
bullets.04: Gather direct feedback and build a community around your brand.

bullets.01: During your 30-day test phase, we will create a sample app for you. This includes a small taste of your menu. You keep the reins in your hands and can complete the content as you wish using our simple modular system.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: You can either fill a formular so we come back to you with a tailored service for your requirements. Or you can direct call or contact our founder.

howLong.question: How long does it take until my digital menu is ready?
howLong.answer: Once we receive your menu details and branding assets (logo, colors, images), your digital menu is usually ready within 3-5 business days. We make sure it works seamlessly before handing it over to you.

responsiveDesign.question: What does a responsive web app mean?
responsiveDesign.answer: Responsive means your digital menu automatically adapts to any device — mobile phones, tablets, or desktop screens. Guests will have a smooth experience without needing to download an app.

designChanges.question: What design changes are possible?
designChanges.answer: We customize colors, fonts, and layouts to match your restaurant’s branding. You can also add photos, highlight popular dishes, and update your menu items anytime. If you need advanced customization, our team can support you.

expect30days.question: What can I expect during the first 30 days?
expect30days.answer: You can fully test the platform free of charge for 30 days. This includes uploading your real menu, checking how guests interact, and requesting design tweaks. No risk, no commitment — we want you to be 100% confident before continuing.

updateMyself.question: Can I update my menu by myself?
updateMyself.answer: Yes! You’ll have access to a simple admin dashboard where you can edit items, prices, or photos instantly. No technical skills required.

appDownload.question: Do my guests need to download an app?
appDownload.answer: No downloads are needed. Your menu is accessible through a QR code or a direct link, so guests can open it instantly in their browser.

customerSupport.question: Is customer support included?
customerSupport.answer: Absolutely. We provide dedicated support via email, phone, or live chat. Most requests are resolved within 24 hours.

secure.question: How secure is the platform?
secure.answer: Your data and your guests’ data are protected with industry-standard security protocols. We also provide regular updates and monitoring to ensure reliability.

contact.title: Do you have any more questions?
contact.description: You can fill out our quick form and we’ll get back to you with a tailored solution. Prefer a direct conversation? Call or reach out to our founder personally.

clients.title: Benefits for your clients
clients.bullet01: Instant access to your menu via QR code.
clients.bullet02: Always updated with real prices and items.
clients.bullet03: Smooth browsing with photos and videos.

business.title: Benefits for your business
business.bullet01: Update menus anytime with no reprints.
business.bullet02: Highlight offers and drive more sales.
business.bullet03: Reach new tourists and local customers.
business.bullet04: Save costs and cut down paper waste.

employees.title: Benefits for your employees
employees.bullet01: Simplify work with an easy-to-use system.
employees.bullet03: Spend more time on customer service.
employees.bullet04: Receive instant alerts for new orders.

technical.title: Technical advantages
technical.bullet02: Works flawlessly on any mobile device.

reviews.title: Hear what our clients say about <boldRed>MyRestaurantMenu</boldRed>

pizzeria.title: Mario’s Pizzeria
pizzeria.bullet01: “With MyRestaurantMenu, our customers can scan and order instantly. No more waiting for printed menus, and we’ve seen a real boost in table turnover and sales.”

foodMarket.title: FreshTown Food Market
foodMarket.bullet01: “Managing multiple restaurant menus used to be a headache. Now everything is in one place, easy to update, and our visitors love the convenience of browsing all options from a single QR code.”

restaurantFoodMarket.title: La Cocina @ City Market
restaurantFoodMarket.bullet01: “Being inside a busy food market, visibility matters. Thanks to MyRestaurantMenu, we can manage our menu in minutes and advertise directly within the market’s digital menu system — it brings us more customers every day.”

step01.title: 01. Onboarding
step01.bullet01: Quick introduction call to understand your restaurant’s needs.
step01.bullet02: Send us your menu details, branding, and preferences.
step01.bullet03: Personalized support to ensure a smooth start.

step02.title: 02. Creation
step02.bullet01: We set up your digital menu in just a few days.
step02.bullet02: Easily customize design, promotions, and loyalty tools in our CMS.

step03.title: 03. Ready to go
step03.bullet01: Launch instantly with your unique QR code and share it with customers.
step03.bullet02: Your menu works on any device, in any language, without app downloads.
step03.bullet03: Enjoy higher engagement, smoother service, and more sales from day one.
